5. Conduct acceptance testing with real users to get feedback on usability and overall satisfaction. Acceptance testing involves having actual people use your application in various situations to gather their opinions about its performance, ease of use, and value proposition. This helps you identify areas for improvement as well as validating assumptions you may have made during development.
